MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode areas of Glentrool and Bargrennan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:41pm. Our emergency response team are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault. To allow time for our team to carry out investigations, we now expect supplies to be restored as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:29pm on Monday, 26th April 2021
